title: Tvvo sermons the one commending the ministerie in generall: the other defending the office of bishops in particular: both preached, and since enlarged by George Dovvname Doctor of Diuinitie.
author: Downame, George, d. 1634.
publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston [and Humphrey Lownes], and are to be sold in Paules Churchyard by Matthew Lownes [and Felix Kyngston],
notes: "A sermon defending the honourable function of bishops" has separate pagination and register, and dated title page with imprint containing "printed by H.L. for Matthew Lownes, and Felix Kyngston". It may have been issued separately.
Variant: general title page in a different setting, with imprint lacking Lownes' address.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
